message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that I think you'll love. I'm willing to start the negotiations at a price of $1500000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I think the starting price is a bit high. I'm willing to consider it if you can bring the price down to $900000. Can you meet me halfway?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1500000 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway, but not all the way to $900000. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1100000. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $1100000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $900000 and $1100000. Can you consider selling the product to me for $1000000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $1050000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $1050000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1050000 and $1000000. Can you consider selling the product to me for $1025000?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can sell the product to you for $1030000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1030000 and $1000000. Can you consider selling the product to me for $1015000?

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot. I'm sticking to my previous offer of $1030000. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand that you've compromised a lot, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll meet you halfway between $1030000 and $1000000, but I'll also throw in an additional $5000 to sweeten the deal. Can you consider selling the product to me for $1007500?
